attributes.action: Make misinformation and false truths by MSP's a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
MSP's  - openly admitting the morning after EU referendum that they had miss lead the public.

Msp Scottish refendum saying that Scotland will get the pound, this was countered by the Bank of England. 
Over estimation massively of oil reserves, missleading information.
Scotland entitled to join EU all with no evidence to support and no meeting had before this was broadcast. Misleading information not garenteeed again.
Many more examples to be seen.
USE OF PROPAGANDA .
attributes.background:
In light of current events. MSP's have been misleading the general population with false truths and facts In order to secure campaign majority wins. 
Ie wild over projections and using misleading information much like a product being miss sold by false information being provided.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to make it illegal for any UK political figure to knowingly lie or mislead, we already have a petition on that which you could sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119416
